xworker.html.extjs.Items/@Button
@xworker.app.view.extjs.widgets.grid.EditorWithReqIdTpl/@ThingTemplate/@event_type_grid/@buttons/@Button/@handler
sname
handler
Scode
#$@text#$@
Ext.Msg.prompt('${data.infoTitle?default("提示")}', '${data.infoMessage?default("请输入新的标识：")}', function(btn, text){
    if (btn == 'ok' && text){
        var store = Ext.StoreMgr.get('${data.cmpId?if_exists}_store');
        store.insert(store.getCount(), new store.recordType({${data.idName?if_exists}:text}));
    }
});
#$@text#$@
shaveTypeInCode
false
svarglobal
false
sdescriptors
xworker.html.extjs.Ext.Button/@24224

xworker.html.extjs.Items/@Button
@xworker.app.view.extjs.widgets.grid.EditorWithReqIdTpl/@ThingTemplate/@event_type_grid/@buttons/@Button1/@handler
sname
handler
Scode
#$@text#$@
var grid = Ext.getCmp('${data.cmpId?if_exists}');
Ext.xworker.util.removeGridSelectedRows(grid, '${data.deleteInfoTitle?default("警告")}', '${data.deleteMessage?default("确实要删除选中的数据么？")}');
#$@text#$@
shaveTypeInCode
false
svarglobal
false
sdescriptors
xworker.html.extjs.Ext.Button/@24224
